DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetics single dose pregabalin control release ( CR ) tablet administer fast even relative single dose CR tablet administer immediately follow 600 750 calorie even meal . The single dose pharmacokinetics pregabalin CR administer fed fast also compare single dose pharmacokinetics pregabalin immediate release ( IR ) capsule . In addition , safety tolerability 3 treatment evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Of Absorption And Pharmacokinetics Of A Single Dose Of Controlled Release Pregabalin Tablet Administered Fasted In The Evening Immediately Following A 600-750 Calorie Evening Meal As Compared To Single Dose Of Immediate Release Pregabalin Capsule In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate absorption , pharmacokinetics , safety/tolerability single dose pregabalin CR tablet various condition compare single dose pregabalin IR capsule
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female Between age 18 55 year , inclusive Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 Illicit drug use Pregnant nursing female Females childbearing potential unwilling unable use acceptable method contraception
